name: Walking to Job
description:
Walking to Job

Your are on your way to work, but some people from your neighbor want some of your time. Are you going to help them but get late, or Getting at work ignoring them.

The Team:

The Concept of the Team:
We decided that every body will take a job that they are interested in, but never tried it.
Every person in the team was able to Help each other because every member already add a real expertise, ether in art, in Audio, in Design or Programming.

Team member:
Christopher Wood - Programmer (Usually does Audio)
Enrico - Pixel Artist (Usually Programmer)
Gabriel Doyon - Ui Designer (Usually Level Designer)
Lennard Walper - Artist (usually does Programming)
Robert Swanger - Level Design (Usually does Audio)
Tobias Joppen - Sound Guy (usually does Programming)
Wade - Programmer helper (Usually Audio Designer)
